Beaches.name: Puri Beach
Beaches.description: Famous beach known for its golden sands and religious significance.

Beaches.name: Chandrabhaga Beach
Beaches.description: Scenic beach near Konark Sun Temple offering breathtaking views.

Beaches.name: Gopalpur Beach
Beaches.description: Quiet beach ideal for relaxation and water sports.

National Parks.name: Simlipal National Park
National Parks.description: One of the largest national parks in India, known for its biodiversity.

National Parks.name: Bhitarkanika National Park
National Parks.description: Famous for its mangrove forests, crocodiles, and migratory birds.

National Parks.name: Chilika Lake
National Parks.description: Asia's largest brackish water lagoon, known for bird watching and boating.

Historical Sites.name: Konark Sun Temple
Historical Sites.description: 13th-century temple dedicated to the Sun God, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Historical Sites.name: Jagannath Temple
Historical Sites.description: One of the four Char Dham pilgrimage sites, dedicated to Lord Jagannath.

Historical Sites.name: Udayagiri and Khandagiri Caves
Historical Sites.description: Ancient Jain rock-cut shelters dating back to the 2nd century BCE.

Waterfalls.name: Chitrakote Falls
Waterfalls.description: Widest waterfall in India, also called the 'Niagara Falls of India.'

Waterfalls.name: Tirathgarh Falls
Waterfalls.description: Beautiful tiered waterfall surrounded by lush greenery.

Waterfalls.name: Amrit Dhara Waterfall
Waterfalls.description: Scenic waterfall located in the Koriya district.

Caves.name: Kanger Ghati National Park
Caves.description: Home to ancient caves with prehistoric rock paintings.

Caves.name: Kutumsar Caves
Caves.description: Limestone caves known for their stalactites and stalagmites formations.

Caves.name: Dandak Caves
Caves.description: Limestone caves located in the Kanger Valley National Park.

Wildlife Sanctuaries.name: Barnawapara Wildlife Sanctuary
Wildlife Sanctuaries.description: Known for its diverse flora and fauna, including leopards and tigers.

Wildlife Sanctuaries.name: Sitanadi Wildlife Sanctuary
Wildlife Sanctuaries.description: Rich in wildlife with dense forests and scenic beauty.

Wildlife Sanctuaries.name: Udanti Wildlife Sanctuary
Wildlife Sanctuaries.description: Famous for its population of the endangered wild buffalo.

Historical Sites.name: Sirpur
Historical Sites.description: Ancient town known for its archaeological and historical significance.

Historical Sites.name: Kanker Palace
Historical Sites.description: Historic palace offering a glimpse into royal life and heritage.

Historical Sites.name: Ratanpur
Historical Sites.description: Historic town known for the ancient Mahamaya Temple.

Hill Stations.name: Nainital
Hill Stations.description: Famous hill station known for its picturesque lake and surrounding hills.

Hill Stations.name: Mussoorie
Hill Stations.description: Popular hill station offering stunning views of the Himalayas.

Hill Stations.name: Auli
Hill Stations.description: Skiing destination known for its snow-capped peaks and scenic views.

Hill Stations.name: Ranikhet
Hill Stations.description: Hill station known for its scenic beauty and ancient temples.

Trekking Spots.name: Valley of Flowers
Trekking Spots.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its diverse alpine flora.

Trekking Spots.name: Roopkund Lake
Trekking Spots.description: Mystery lake famous for its skeletal remains and trekking.

Trekking Spots.name: Kedarkantha
Trekking Spots.description: Popular winter trek offering panoramic views of snow-clad mountains.

Trekking Spots.name: Har Ki Dun
Trekking Spots.description: Famous trekking destination with panoramic views of the Himalayas.

Pilgrimage Sites.name: Kedarnath Temple
Pilgrimage Sites.description: One of the most revered Hindu temples dedicated to Lord Shiva.

Pilgrimage Sites.name: Badrinath Temple
Pilgrimage Sites.description: Sacred temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, part of the Char Dham Yatra.

Pilgrimage Sites.name: Haridwar
Pilgrimage Sites.description: Ancient city and important pilgrimage site located on the banks of the Ganges.

Pilgrimage Sites.name: Rishikesh Temple
Pilgrimage Sites.description: Known as the 'Yoga Capital of the World' and a major pilgrimage site.

National Parks.name: Jim Corbett National Park
National Parks.description: Oldest national park in India, known for its tiger reserve.

National Parks.name: Rajaji National Park
National Parks.location: Haridwar, Dehradun, and Pauri Garhwal districts
National Parks.description: Known for its rich biodiversity and elephant population.

National Parks.name: Gangotri National Park
National Parks.description: Known for its scenic beauty and the origin of the Ganges River.
